def_cn: （动物或植物的）杂（交）种，混（合）种
def_en: A hybrid is an animal or plant that has been bred from two different species of animal or plant.

def_cn: （尤指两种不同物质的）混合物，合成物
def_en: You can use hybrid to refer to anything that is a mixture of other things, especially two other things.

def_cn: 混合动力车；油电混合车
def_en: A hybrid or a hybrid car is a car that has both an electric motor and an ordinary car engine. It uses the ordinary engine when it needs extra power.
